general: Today, the Moon in Cancer illuminates your emotional life, urging you to reconnect with your inner needs. The planetary influences favor creativity and intuition, enabling you to explore your deepest feelings.
love: Open your heart and express your feelings to your partner; vulnerability is your strength today.
work: Do not hesitate to propose your innovative ideas in the meeting, they could be well received and lead to fruitful collaborations.
health: Take the time to relax and meditate; a moment of calm will revitalize you.
advice: Listen to your intuition, it will guide you.
teaser: A day to listen to your heart.
